name: amqp.channel
description: A simplified way to setup an AMQP connection/channel with amqplib

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha test --recursive -- -u exports -R spec && open coverage/lcov-report/amqp.channel/index.html

author: NGPVAN
